tceper 0.1.2
  • Reference
    • Getting started
    • API endpoints reference
    • Exploring endpoints, parameters, and fields

Package index

Core

Low-level function for querying any API endpoint.

tce_request()
Perform a request to the TCE-PE Open Data API
tceper tceper-package
tceper: Access the Open Data API of TCE-PE

Endpoint catalog

Discover endpoints and inspect input/output fields from the built-in API catalog.

tce_catalog()
List available API endpoints
tce_endpoint()
Get the catalog entry for a given endpoint
tce_params()
List input parameters for an endpoint
tce_fields()
List output fields for an endpoint
print(<tce_params_tbl>)
Print method for tce_params() output
print(<tce_fields_tbl>)
Print method for tce_fields() output

Revenues

State and municipal revenue data.

tce_state_revenues()
State revenues
tce_municipal_revenues()
Municipal revenues
tce_budgeted_revenues()
Budgeted revenues (municipal)

Expenditures

State and municipal expenditure data.

tce_state_expenditures()
State expenditures
tce_municipal_expenditures()
Municipal expenditures
tce_municipal_transfers()
Municipal granted transfers
tce_municipal_creditor_types()
Municipal creditor types
tce_state_creditor_types()
State creditor types

Budget commitments

Commitment (empenho) summaries, liquidations, payments and line items.

tce_commitment_summary()
Commitment summary
tce_commitment_liquidations()
Commitment liquidations
tce_commitment_payments()
Commitment payments
tce_state_commitment_items()
State commitment line items
tce_state_price_comparison()
State price comparison

Suppliers

Supplier registry and sanctions.

tce_suppliers()
Suppliers
tce_sanctions()
Sanctions
tce_person_creditor_types()
Person creditor types

Procurement & contracts

Bids, contracts, amendments, agreements and related lookup tables.

tce_contracts()
Contracts
tce_contract_documents()
Contract documents
tce_contract_items()
Contract line items
tce_contract_amendments()
Contract amendments
tce_agreements()
Agreements (Convenios)
tce_bids()
Bids
tce_bid_details()
Bid details with bidders
tce_bid_documents()
Bid documents
tce_bid_stages()
Bid stages
tce_bid_modalities()
Bid modalities
tce_bid_statuses()
Bid statuses
tce_bid_legal_basis()
Bid legal basis
tce_object_characteristics()
Object characteristics
tce_object_classifications()
Object classifications
tce_object_nature()
Object nature types

Public works

Engineering works, contractors, audits and school transport.

tce_public_works()
Public works
tce_public_works_contractors()
Public works contractor data
tce_public_works_audits()
Public works audit data
tce_school_transport()
School transport

Legal processes

Processes, determinations, recommendations, outcomes, debts, fines and spending limits.

tce_processes()
Legal processes
tce_determinations()
Determinations
tce_consideranda()
Consideranda
tce_recommendations()
Recommendations
tce_outcomes()
Process outcomes
tce_retirement_outcomes()
Retirement, pension and reform outcomes
tce_special_accountability()
Special accountability outcomes
tce_debts_fines()
Debts and fines
tce_spending_limits()
Spending limits

Personnel

Public servant records.

tce_servants()
Public servants

Reference tables

Municipalities, managed entities, sub-units, creditor types, payroll types, funding sources and inactivation reasons.

tce_municipalities()
Municipalities
tce_entities()
Managed entities (all)
tce_state_entities()
State managed entities
tce_municipal_entities()
Municipal managed entities
tce_sub_units()
Sub-units of managed entities
tce_creditor_types()
Creditor types
tce_payroll_types()
Payroll types
tce_funding_sources()
Funding source types
tce_inactivation_reasons()
Inactivation reason types

RemessaTCEPE

Data from the RemessaTCEPE system: benefit types, reference sources/dates/codes, update indices, budget statuses, legal instruments, procurement processes and public works.

tce_benefit_types()
Benefit types (Remessa)
tce_reference_sources()
Reference sources (Remessa)
tce_reference_dates()
Reference dates (Remessa)
tce_reference_codes()
Reference codes (Remessa)
tce_update_indices()
Price update indices (Remessa)
tce_budget_statuses()
Budget item statuses (Remessa)
tce_legal_instruments()
Legal instruments (Remessa)
tce_legal_instrument_documents()
Legal instrument documents (Remessa)
tce_legal_instrument_items()
Legal instrument items (Remessa)
tce_legal_instrument_participants()
Legal instrument participants (Remessa)
tce_procurement_processes()
Procurement processes (Remessa)
tce_procurement_process_documents()
Procurement process documents (Remessa)
tce_procurement_process_budget()
Procurement process budget (Remessa)
tce_procurement_process_participants()
Procurement process participants (Remessa)
tce_remessa_works()
Public works details (Remessa)
tce_remessa_works_execution()
Public works execution (Remessa)
tce_remessa_works_geometry()
Public works geometry (Remessa)

Cache

Manage the in-memory cache.

tce_cache_clear()
Clear the tceper in-memory cache
tce_cache_info()
Show cache status
